attributes.action: provide EMA to all students in further education, or scrap the system itself.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
EMA (electronic maintenance allowance) 
gives money to people who attend college on time and to all their lessons. however to attain this you have to meet the criteria. This is said to be an incentive 
"The EMA recognizes that some young people do not stay on in post 16 learning because of financial cost, and others struggle to the detriment of their studies. In addition, we know from participation rates that children from professional/managerial families are more likely to stay on in post 16 learning than children from unskilled, manual class families. The EMA acknowledges this and helps to remove financial barriers by incentivising young people to stay on in learning"
as quoted from the government.
However i feel this has a net affect on those who do not meet the criteria as they do not get any financial incentive while a majority of peers get their EMA and EMA bonuses (100 pounds for every bonus)
